title: After 4 Sons Vanish, Their Mother Devotes Her Life to Mexico’s Missing
description: Over 100,000 people are missing in Mexico, but even amid this national agony, one mother’s story stands out both for the scope of her suffering and for her work trying to end the nation’s nightmare.
dc:creator: Oscar Lopez
media:credit: Marian Carrasquero for The New York Times
media:description: After María Herrera Magdaleno’s four sons disappeared, she began advocating for all parents in Mexico with missing children.
